humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, the right sentinel lymph node (SLN #1) has no metastatic carcinoma (0/2), and the additional axillary contents also have no metastatic carcinoma (0/1). The left breast and axillary tail have 18 reactive lymph nodes, all negative for metastatic carcinoma (0/18). Based on the new rules 10, 11, and the original rule 2, the N stage for this patient is N0 (no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that for the right axilla, there were two sentinel lymph nodes excised and they were both negative for metastatic carcinoma (0/2). For the left breast and axillary tail mastectomy, 18 lymph nodes were dissected and they were all negative for metastatic carcinoma (0/18). For the additional axillary contents excision, one reactive lymph node was negative for metastatic carcinoma (0/1). Therefore, the patient's N stage is N0.
